By entering your email and accepting our terms and conditions, you are giving us your consent to keep in touch with you via email about fundraising, support services, upcoming events or important information about the charity.

We will use your email address to send you our e-newsletters and bulletins on a regular basis, no more than once a week.

Your details will be entered into our database to enable us to keep in touch in this way by being able to include you on an email list.

We will not share, sell, trade or rent your email address to anyone else.

To protect your information we have appropriate data collection, storage and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction of your email address.

By ticking the box and submitting via the sign up button, you signify your acceptance of these terms and conditions.

If you change your mind about hearing from us at any time, you can let us know by emailing: info@aphasiasupport.org or calling us on 01924 562443.
